name: Hexplosions (GameDevGuyUK)
description:
Hexplosions

Hexplosions, at its heart, is a match 3 puzzle game but with strategic planning, you can work towards a high score worthy of our global leaderboards.

This game is a pure development build right now and as such will likely not function correctly or have all features included. Posted here for feedback purposes and for general discussion whilst I build.

I have added some effects, particles and post-processing but ALL of this will likely be changed before release as I just added some temporary ones in to get a feel for the game.

Track my progress building this game on my YouTube channel.

I am aware of bugs and missing features but please do comment and let me know your findings anyway as it will help me to not miss anything.

Bugs I am currently aware of (I'll try and keep this up-to-date)

  • Purple and Pink are very similar with post-processing so need to rethink the colour. - Fixed
  • Sometimes when entering the game over page, the high score gets submitted but doesn't update the UI so the player doesn't see their score on the boards.
  • Switching between gamepad and keyboard during a game doesn't always change the UI to reflect the buttons. - Fixed
